original_text: And he reared up the pillars before the temple, one on the right hand, and the other on the left; and called the name of that on the right hand Jachin, and the name of that on the left Boaz.
korean_text: 그 두 기둥을 성전 앞에 세웠으니 왼쪽에 하나요 오른쪽에 하나라 오른쪽 것은 야긴이라 부르고 왼쪽 것은 보아스라 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: And he reared up the pillars before the temple
and the other on the left
and called the name of that on the right hand Jachin
and the name of that on the left Boaz
